newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER SHOWCASE-CELTIC V RANGERS TEAMS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER SHOWCASE-CELTIC V RANGERS TEAMS.

text.p: Teams for Sunday's Scottish premier division match between Celtic and Rangers at Celtic Park:
Celtic - 1-Stewart Kerr; 2-Enrico Annoni, 3-Tosh McKinlay, 4- Jackie McNamara, 5-Malky Mackay, 6-Peter Grant, 7-Paolo Di Canio, 8-Paul McStay, 9-Alan Stubbs, 10-Phil O'Donnell, 11-Jorge Cadete
Rangers - 1-Andy Dibble, 2-Alex Cleland, 3-Jorg Albertz, 4- Richard Gough, 5-Alan McLaren, 6-Joachim Bjorklund, 7-Craig Moore, 8-Ian Ferguson, 9-Ian Durrant, 10-Mark Hateley, 11-Brian Laudrup
